customCommands.name: code-review
customCommands.prompt: Review this code for best practices, potential bugs, and improvements. Provide specific, actionable feedback.

customCommands.name: optimize
customCommands.prompt: Optimize this code for performance, readability, and maintainability. Explain the changes made.

customCommands.name: explain
customCommands.prompt: Explain this code in simple terms. Break down what it does, how it works, and any important concepts.

customCommands.name: test-cases
customCommands.prompt: Generate comprehensive test cases for this code, including edge cases and error scenarios.
